title: China's Tencent takes a 10% stake in Snapchat parent Snap

replies.msg:
China internet giant Tencent has taken a 10 percent stake in Snapchat parent Snap.
Tencent purchased the 145.8 million non-voting shares over the last quarter. China's largest messaging app has invested in Snap before, in 2012 and 2013, in private rounds.
The news comes as a vote of confidence in Snap, one day after the company posted a huge revenue miss for the third quarter.

個市再係咁升落去中資真係夠錢買起地球
QQ一隻一年市值多左成萬億，仲要手持大把中外上市公司股份，影響力超越好多國家
